member.name: T:MathClass.BasicMath
member.summary:
Th main Basic Math class. Contains all methods for performing basic math functions.
Add Addition Operation
Substract Substraction Operation
Multiply Multiplicaition Operation
Divide Dvision Operation

member.name: M:MathClass.BasicMath.Add(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add two integers and returns the result

member.name: M:MathClass.BasicMath.Add(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Add two doubles and returns the result

member.name: M:MathClass.BasicMath.Substract(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Substracts b from a and returns the result

member.name: M:MathClass.BasicMath.Substract(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Substracts a double from another double and returns the result

member.name: M:MathClass.BasicMath.Multiply(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Multiplies two integers and returns the result

member.name: M:MathClass.BasicMath.Multiply(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Multiplies two doubles and returns the result

member.name: M:MathClass.BasicMath.Divide(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Divide an integer by another and returns the result

member.name: M:MathClass.BasicMath.Divide(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Divides a double by another and returns the result
